TopicTitle: EVA- Just something I threw together

Articles.Content:
Is... is that another Kerbin behind the Mun? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Great job, you did great on the logo. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Is... is that another Kerbin behind the Mun? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> Great job, you did great on the logo. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Lol, it's Minmus, just didnt have the right pencils in my desk....

If you made the bottom of the Kerbal's face a bit more roundedd, and mad ethe face a bit taller, it would have been perfect. 8/10.

That's pretty good.
